verses.verse: "And in the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4075>Mede,<s%> I <S%H5975>arose<s%> to be an <S%H2388>encouragement<s%> and a <S%H4581>protection<s%> for him.

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you the <S%H571>truth.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> are going to <S%H5975>arise<s%> in <S%H6539>Persia.<s%> Then a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> will <S%H6238>gain<s%> <S%H1419>far<s%> <S%H1419>more<s%> <S%H6239>riches<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> [of them;] as soon as he becomes <S%H2393>strong<s%> through his <S%H6239>riches,<s%> he will <S%H5782>arouse<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> [empire] against the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of <S%H3120>Greece.<s%>
"And a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H5975>arise,<s%> and he will <S%H4910>rule<s%> with <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4474>authority<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as he <S%H7522>pleases.<s%>

"But as soon as he has <S%H5975>arisen,<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> will be <S%H7665>broken<s%> up and <S%H2673>parceled<s%> out toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>points<s%> of the <S%H8064>compass,<s%> though not to his [own] <S%H319>descendants,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> according to his <S%H4915>authority<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4910>wielded;<s%> for his <S%H4438>sovereignty<s%> will be <S%H5428>uprooted<s%> and [given] to <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> them.

"Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will <S%H2388>grow<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> along with [one] of his <S%H8269>princes<s%> who will <S%H2388>gain<s%> <S%H2388>ascendancy<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him and <S%H4910>obtain<s%> <S%H4910>dominion;<s%> his <S%H4475>domain<s%> [will be] a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4475>dominion<s%> [indeed].

"And <S%H7093>after<s%> some <S%H8141>years<s%> they will <S%H2266>form<s%> an <S%H2266>alliance,<s%> and the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North<s%> to <S%H6213>carry<s%> out a <S%H4339>peaceful<s%> <S%H4339>arrangement.<s%> But she will not <S%H6113>retain<s%> her <S%H2220>position<s%> of <S%H3581>power,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> will he <S%H5975>remain<s%> with his <S%H2220>power,<s%> but she will be <S%H5414>given<s%> up, along with those who <S%H935>brought<s%> her in, and the one who <S%H3205>sired<s%> her, as well as he who <S%H2388>supported<s%> her in [those] <S%H6256>times.<s%>

"But one of the <S%H5342>descendants<s%> of her <S%H8328>line<s%> will <S%H5975>arise<s%> in his <S%H3653>place,<s%> and he will <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> [their] <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H4581>fortress<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North,<s%> and he will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with them and <S%H2388>display<s%> [great] <S%H2388>strength.<s%>

"And <S%H1571>also<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> with their <S%H9331>metal<s%> <S%H9331>images<s%> [and] their <S%H2532>precious<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> he will <S%H935>take<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and he on his <S%H1931>part<s%> will <S%H5975>refrain<s%> from [attacking] the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North<s%> for [some] <S%H8141>years.<s%>
"Then the latter will <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H4438>realm<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> but will <S%H7725>return<s%> to his [own] <S%H127>land.<s%>

"And his <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H1624>mobilize<s%> and <S%H622>assemble<s%> a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2428>forces;<s%> and one of them will <S%H935>keep<s%> on <S%H935>coming<s%> and <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> that he may <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H1624>wage<s%> <S%H1624>war<s%> up to his [very] <S%H4581>fortress.<s%>

"And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will be <S%H4843>enraged<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North.<s%> Then the latter will <S%H5975>raise<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> but [that] <S%H1995>multitude<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the [former].

"When the <S%H1995>multitude<s%> is <S%H5375>carried<s%> away, his <S%H3824>heart<s%> will be <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up, and he will cause <S%H7239>tens<s%> of <S%H7239>thousands<s%> to <S%H5307>fall;<s%> yet he will not <S%H5810>prevail.<s%>

"For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North<s%> will <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5975>raise<s%> a <S%H7227>greater<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H7223>former,<s%> and <S%H7093>after<s%> an <S%H7093>interval<s%> <S%H6256><s%> of <S%H6256>some<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> he will <S%H935>press<s%> on with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> and <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7399>equipment.<s%>

"Now in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> will <S%H5975>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South;<s%> the <S%H6530>violent<s%> <S%H1121>ones<s%> <S%H6530><s%> among your <S%H5971>people<s%> will also <S%H5375>lift<s%> themselves up in order to <S%H5975>fulfill<s%> the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> but they will <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H3782>down.<s%>

"Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North<s%> will <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H8210>cast<s%> up a <S%H5550>siege<s%> <S%H5550>mound,<s%> and <S%H3920>capture<s%> a well-fortified <S%H5892>city;<s%> and the <S%H2220>forces<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will not <S%H5975>stand<s%> [their ground,] not even their <S%H4005>choicest<s%> <S%H5971>troops,<s%> for <S%H369>there<s%> will be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5975>make<s%> a <S%H5975>stand.<s%>

"But he who <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> him will <S%H6213>do<s%> as he <S%H7522>pleases,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> will [be able to] <S%H6440>withstand<s%> <S%H5975><s%> him; he will also <S%H5975>stay<s%> [for a time] in the <S%H9469>Beautiful<s%> <S%H776>Land,<s%> with <S%H3617>destruction<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"And he will <S%H7760>set<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> with the <S%H8633>power<s%> of his <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4438>kingdom,<s%> bringing with him a <S%H3477>proposal<s%> of <S%H3477>peace<s%> which he will <S%H6213>put<s%> into <S%H6213>effect;<s%> he will also <S%H5414>give<s%> him the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H802>women<s%> to <S%H7843>ruin<s%> it. But she will not <S%H5975>take<s%> a <S%H5975>stand<s%> [for him] or be on his side.

"Then he will <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> and <S%H3920>capture<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%> But a <S%H7101>commander<s%> will <S%H7673>put<s%> a <S%H7673>stop<s%> to his <S%H2781>scorn<s%> against him; <S%H1115>moreover,<s%> he will <S%H7725>repay<s%> him for his <S%H2781>scorn.<s%>

"So he will <S%H7725>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H4581>fortresses<s%> of his own <S%H776>land,<s%> but he will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> and <S%H5307>fall<s%> and be <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more.

"Then in his <S%H3653>place<s%> one will <S%H5975>arise<s%> who will <S%H5674>send<s%> an <S%H5065>oppressor<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H1925>Jewel<s%> of [his] <S%H4438>kingdom;<s%> yet within a <S%H259>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> he will be <S%H7665>shattered,<s%> though <S%H3808>neither<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

"And in his <S%H3653>place<s%> a <S%H959>despicable<s%> person will <S%H5975>arise,<s%> on whom the <S%H1935>honor<s%> of <S%H4438>kingship<s%> has not been <S%H5414>conferred,<s%> but he will <S%H935>come<s%> in a <S%H7962>time<s%> of <S%H7962>tranquility<s%> and <S%H2388>seize<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> by <S%H2519>intrigue.<s%>

"And the <S%H7858>overflowing<s%> <S%H2220>forces<s%> will be <S%H7857>flooded<s%> <S%H7857>away<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him and <S%H7665>shattered,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

"And <S%H4480>after<s%> an <S%H2266>alliance<s%> is <S%H2266>made<s%> with him he will <S%H6213>practice<s%> <S%H4820>deception,<s%> and he will <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H6105>gain<s%> <S%H6105>power<s%> with a <S%H4592>small<s%> [force of] <S%H1471>people.<s%>

"In a <S%H7962>time<s%> of <S%H7962>tranquility<s%> he will <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H9304>richest<s%> [parts] of the <S%H4082>realm,<s%> and he will <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> his fathers <S%H1>never<s%> <S%H3808>did,<s%> <S%H6213>nor<s%> his ancestors; he will <S%H3808>distribute<s%> <S%H1>plunder,<s%> <S%H967>booty,<s%> and <S%H961>possessions<s%> among them, and he will <S%H7998>devise<s%> his <S%H7399>schemes<s%> <S%H2803>against<s%> <S%H4284>strongholds,<s%> but [only] for a <S%H5921>time.<s%>

"And he will <S%H5782>stir<s%> up his <S%H3581>strength<s%> and <S%H3824>courage<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> with a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H2428>army;<s%> so the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will <S%H1624>mobilize<s%> an <S%H5704>extremely<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1419>large<s%> and <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> for <S%H4421>war;<s%> but he will not <S%H5975>stand,<s%> for <S%H4284>schemes<s%> will be <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him.

"And those who <S%H398>eat<s%> his <S%H6598>choice<s%> <S%H6598>food<s%> will <S%H7665>destroy<s%> him, and his <S%H2428>army<s%> will <S%H7857>overflow,<s%> but <S%H7227>many<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain.<s%>

"As for <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H4428>kings,<s%> their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> will be [intent] on <S%H7489>evil,<s%> and they will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> [to each other] at the <S%H259>same<s%> <S%H7979>table;<s%> but it will not <S%H6743>succeed,<s%> for the <S%H7093>end<s%> is <S%H5750>still<s%> [to come] at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time.<s%>

"Then he will <S%H7725>return<s%> to his <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H1419>much<s%> <S%H7399>plunder;<s%> but his <S%H3824>heart<s%> will be [set] <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and he will <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action<s%> and [then] <S%H7725>return<s%> to his [own] <S%H776>land.<s%>

"At the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> he will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5045>South,<s%> but this <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H314>time<s%> it will not <S%H1961>turn<s%> out the way it did <S%H7223>before.<s%>

"For <S%H6716>ships<s%> of <S%H3794>Kittim<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> against him; therefore he will be <S%H3512>disheartened,<s%> and will <S%H7725>return<s%> and <S%H2194>become<s%> <S%H2194>enraged<s%> at the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action;<s%> so he will <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> and <S%H995>show<s%> <S%H995>regard<s%> for those who <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

"And <S%H2220>forces<s%> from him will <S%H5975>arise,<s%> <S%H2490>desecrate<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> <S%H4581>fortress,<s%> and <S%H5493>do<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> with the <S%H8548>regular<s%> <S%H8548>sacrifice.<s%> And they will <S%H5414>set<s%> up the <S%H8251>abomination<s%> of <S%H8074>desolation.<s%>

"And by <S%H2514>smooth<s%> [words] he will <S%H2610>turn<s%> to <S%H2610>godlessness<s%> those who <S%H7561>act<s%> <S%H7561>wickedly<s%> toward the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H3045>know<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H2388>display<s%> <S%H2388>strength<s%> and <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action.<s%>

"And those who <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>insight<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H995>give<s%> <S%H995>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7227>many;<s%> yet they will <S%H3782>fall<s%> by <S%H2719>sword<s%> and by <S%H3852>flame,<s%> by <S%H7628>captivity<s%> and by <S%H961>plunder,<s%> for [many] <S%H3117>days.<s%>
"Now when they <S%H3782>fall<s%> they will be <S%H5826>granted<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H5828>help,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> will <S%H3867>join<s%> with them in <S%H2519>hypocrisy.<s%>

"And <S%H4480>some<s%> of those who <S%H7919>have<s%> <S%H7919>insight<s%> will <S%H3782>fall,<s%> in order to <S%H6884>refine,<s%> <S%H1305>purge,<s%> and <S%H3835>make<s%> them <S%H3835>pure,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7093>end<s%> <S%H6256>time;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> [it is] <S%H5750>still<s%> [to come] at the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time.<s%>

"Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> as he <S%H7522>pleases,<s%> and he will <S%H7311>exalt<s%> and <S%H1431>magnify<s%> himself <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H410>god,<s%> and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6381>monstrous<s%> <S%H6381>things<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H410>gods;<s%> and he will <S%H6743>prosper<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> is <S%H3615>finished,<s%> for that which is <S%H2782>decreed<s%> will be <S%H6213>done.<s%>

"And he will <S%H995>show<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H995>regard<s%> for the <S%H430>gods<s%> of his fathers or for the <S%H1>desire<s%> of <S%H2532>women,<s%> <S%H802>nor<s%> will he <S%H3808>show<s%> <S%H995>regard<s%> for <S%H995>any<s%> [other] <S%H3605>god;<s%> for he will <S%H433>magnify<s%> himself <S%H1431>above<s%> [them] <S%H5921>all.<s%>

"But <S%H5921>instead<s%> <S%H3653><s%> he will <S%H3513>honor<s%> a <S%H433>god<s%> of <S%H4581>fortresses,<s%> a <S%H433>god<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> his fathers did not <S%H1>know;<s%> he will <S%H3045>honor<s%> [him] with <S%H3513>gold,<s%> <S%H2091>silver,<s%> <S%H3701>costly<s%> <S%H3368>stones,<s%> and <S%H68>treasures.<s%>

"And he will <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6213>action<s%> against the <S%H4581>strongest<s%> of <S%H4581>fortresses<s%> with [the help of] a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H433>god;<s%> he will <S%H7235>give<s%> <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H9202>honor<s%> to those <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> [him,] and he will cause them to <S%H4910>rule<s%> over the <S%H7227>many,<s%> and will <S%H2505>parcel<s%> out <S%H127>land<s%> for a <S%H4242>price.<s%>

"And at the <S%H7093>end<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%> will <S%H5055>collide<s%> with him, and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6828>North<s%> will <S%H9621>storm<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him with <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> with <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> and with <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H591>ships;<s%> and he will <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H776>countries,<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> [them,] and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through.<s%>

"He will also <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H9469>Beautiful<s%> <S%H776>Land,<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> [countries] will <S%H3782>fall;<s%> but <S%H428>these<s%> will be <S%H4422>rescued<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> and the <S%H7225>foremost<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon.<s%>
"Then he will <S%H7971>stretch<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against [other] <S%H776>countries,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will not <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

"But he will <S%H4910>gain<s%> <S%H4910>control<s%> over the <S%H4362>hidden<s%> <S%H4362>treasures<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and over <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9143>precious<s%> <S%H9143>things<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H3864>Libyans<s%> and <S%H3569>Ethiopians<s%> [will follow] at his <S%H4703>heels.<s%>

"But <S%H8052>rumors<s%> from the <S%H4217>East<s%> and from the <S%H6828>North<s%> will <S%H926>disturb<s%> him, and he will <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> and <S%H2763>annihilate<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>

"And he will <S%H5193>pitch<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of his <S%H643>royal<s%> <S%H643>pavilion<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3220>seas<s%> and the <S%H9469>beautiful<s%> <S%H6944>Holy<s%> <S%H2022>Mountain;<s%> yet he will <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H7093>end,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> will <S%H5826>help<s%> him.
